author: Jamie Lovett
title: Marvel Secret Empire Advance Solicitations

organizations.name: solicitations jamie lovett start slideshow slide of  marvel comics

text:
Marvel Secret Empire Advance Solicitations Jamie Lovett Start Slideshow Slide of 
Marvel Comics has provided ComicBook.com with an exclusive first look at the solicitations for Secret Empire #1 and Secret Empire #2, the first two chapter of the next major Marvel Comics event. 
Marvel Comics has promised that the nine-part Secret Empire event will involve all of the major heroes and factions of the Marvel Universe, and these solicitations back that up. 
While the first issue is described as dealing with the first initial shock of Captain America's Hydra loyalty, the second issue stars Doctor Strange and the Defenders - Luke Cage, Jessica Jones, Daredevil, and Iron Fist - as they are locked in combat with the minions of Baron Mordo. 
Check out the solicitations and cover art, including Hydra hero variant covers by Andrea Sorrentino, in the following slideshow, and check back tomorrow for Marvel Comics' full May 2017 solicitations. 
Secret Empire #1 and Secret Empire #1 both go on sale in comic book stores this May.
